action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1291 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 22.
Amendment SA 1291 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: S422-428; text: CR S422-423) To subpoena John Robert Bolton.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1291 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1291 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 22.
